data.title: A "must" for Oakland souvenir shopping!
data.text: I was on the hunt for Oakland postcards when I happened upon Oaklandish. Although I didn't find postcards there, I left with an awesome Oaklandish logo pint glass, Oakland curry powder, two Oaklandish pins, and complimentary logo stickers! The sales associate was cool and also very friendly, helping me in my unsuccessful postcard search. This is a must-visit when visiting Oakland.
